name: todo-typescript
description: A todo app build in Typescript

scripts.start: tsc -w & tailwindcss build src/styles.css -o public/styles.css & live-server public
scripts.build:css: export NODE_ENV=production && tailwindcss build src/styles.css -o public/styles.css & minify public/styles.css > dist/styles.min.css
